messages.subject: --Remembering Columbia
messages.msgSnippet: I thought there may be some interest here. Coyotes Corner Very Cool Stuff for the World  Remembering Columbia The 23rd Psalm in Cherokee
messages.messageBody:
I thought there may be some interest here.


Coyotes Corner
Very Cool Stuff for the World
<www.coyotescorner.com>


Remembering Columbia The 23rd Psalm in Cherokee Language
<http://www.nativevillage.org/Inspiration-/Honoring%20Columbia--%20February%
201,%202003.htm>

Native Village has a new page at its website honoring the Columbia
astronauts. The voices of Tula and her daughters are so ethreal, like
butterfly wings. Beautiful
